WorkItem.Description:
When clicking add season the NewSeason page fills the screen and I have a javascript error...
 
Object doesnt support this method or property.
 
I tried removing the Response.Write("<script>window.parent.hidePopWin();</script>") line thinking I would just show a message and allow the user to click the red cross, but that still loads the NewSeason (or newTeam for that matter) page to fill the screen.
